executable.title: BRAINSDeface
executable.description: Deidentify head images without destroying useful facial information
executable.acknowledgements: Hans Johnson(1,2,3); Alexander Leinoff(3); Yue Pan(3); Wei Shao(3) 1=University of Iowa Department of Psychiatry, 2=University of Iowa Department of Biomedical Engineering, 3=University of Iowa Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering

image.label: LabelMap
image.name: labelmap
image.description: A Label Map for the head

image.label: DeformedImage name
image.name: deformedImageName
image.description: A name for the output of the deformed Image

image.label: OutputMask name
image.name: outputMask
image.description: A name for the output mask derived from the Atlas Label map

image.label: Distance Map file name
image.name: distanceMapFileName
image.description: A name for the output mask derived from the Atlas Label map

file.label: bSpline Transform file name
file.name: bSplineFileName
file.description: A name for the Displaement Field image generated by the bSpline Transform

image.label: bSpline Displacement Map file name
image.name: bSplineDisplacementFileName
image.description: A name for the Displaement Field image generated by the initial bSpline Transform

image.label: bSpline and distance Displacement Map file name
image.name: smoothDisplacementName
image.description: A name for the Displaement Field combined with the distance map

image.label: diffImage output
image.name: diffImageName
image.description: difference of subject image and transformed image
